arguments.value: Only the owner of this contract

deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text: @dev Stores the address of the person deploying the contract

@dev Enforces a minimun amount of ether to be sent to a function
 @param value The minimum amount to send

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner of this contract can call the function"

arguments.value: Only the owner of this contract can call the function

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the owner of this contract can call the function"

documentation.text: @dev Makes sure the owner is the only one who can call a function

@dev Will be called by the player who enters de game sending ether
 and makes sure he/she is sending a minumun of 0.01 ether

@dev Gets the list of players currently in the game
 @return players

@dev Called by the manager, it picks a winner
 emitting WinnerPicked event

constructor.details: Stores the address of the person deploying the contract

enter().details: Will be called by the player who enters de game sending ether and makes sure he/she is sending a minumun of 0.01 ether

getPlayers().details: Gets the list of players currently in the game

pickWinner().details: Called by the manager, it picks a winner emitting WinnerPicked event
